title: Modelling
code: library(flextreat.hydrus1d)  env <- "flextreat"  kwb.python::conda_py_install(env_name = env,                               pkgs = list(conda="python=3.9",                                          py = "https://github.com/phydrus/phydrus/zipball/dev/79823e797662b9838dda13888e3ead962c6699d0")) #> * Installing Miniconda -- please wait a moment ... #> * Downloading 'https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-MacOSX-x86_64.sh' ... #> * Miniconda has been successfully installed at "~/Library/r-miniconda". #> python:         /Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/flextreat/bin/python #> libpython:      /Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/flextreat/lib/libpython3.9.dylib #> pythonhome:     /Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/flextreat:/Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/flextreat #> version:        3.9.10 | packaged by conda-forge | (main, Feb  1 2022, 21:27:48)  [Clang 11.1.0 ] #> numpy:           [NOT FOUND] #>  #> NOTE: Python version was forced by use_python function  reticulate::use_miniconda(condaenv = env, required = TRUE) phydrus <- reticulate::import("phydrus", convert = TRUE) m <- phydrus$model$Model(exe_name = "C:/Program Files (x86)/PC-Progress/Hydrus-1D 4.xx/H1D_CALC.EXE",                          ws_name = "test",                          name = "Test",                          description = "Test for FlexTreat",                          length_unit = "cm",                          time_unit = "days",                          mass_units = "mmol")

R Package for Soil Water Balance and Solute Transport Modelling
    Scenarios for Project Flextreat
text: details install KWB-R packages checkout installation tutorial.
code: ### Optionally: specify GitHub Personal Access Token (GITHUB_PAT) ### See here why this might be important for you: ### https://kwb-r.github.io/kwb.pkgbuild/articles/install.html#set-your-github_pat  # Sys.setenv(GITHUB_PAT = "mysecret_access_token")  # Install package "remotes" from CRAN if (! require("remotes")) {   install.packages("remotes", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org") }  # Install KWB package 'flextreat.hydrus1d' from GitHub remotes::install_github("KWB-R/flextreat.hydrus1d")

title: Materials — materials
text: dataset containing hydraulic soil characteristics Hydrus1D GUI database

title: Materials — materials
text: data frame 12 rows 7 variables: material_name Name soil Qr Residual soil water content Qs Saturated soil water content Qr Parameter soil water retention function (unit: L-1, : cm) n Parameter n soil water retention function Ks Saturated hydraulic conductivity (unit: LT-1, : cm/day) T Tortuosity parameter conductivity function
